content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. To help you book your electrical service, can I start with your name, please?
Why do you need my name? I just want to fix my lights.
I understand! We need your name to create the appointment and make sure our technician knows whom to contact. Could you please provide your name?
No, I'd rather not. Can we skip that and just schedule someone?
Unfortunately, Iâ€™m unable to book the service without your name for our records. Let me get a team member to assist you further.
reason: Customer refused to provide required information.

content: Hello, I'm Angela with XYZ. We require your name to complete any bookings, but I can assure you your privacy is important to us. If you're comfortable, could you just provide your first name so we can proceed?
